Text:
It is important to note that this game requires a dual-layer DVD-R to burn and play properly.

Here is a prime example of what discs you would want to use (Sony discs also will almost always work):
http://www.amazon.com/dp/B000VMUF7K/

Do not use DVD+R! Even in the rare case that it does work it is bad for your Wii's laser.
